result.execSummary:
The defendant Martin A Radish was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Waukesha County Clerk of Circuit Court

miscConds.notes:
Court costs and DNA surcharge is to be paid as a Condition of Probation.

If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.
Maintain full time employment and/or school.
Expunction is conditionally granted upon verification of completion of sentence, payment of all costs/fees and no new criminal law violations.

Follow through with any treatment/counseling recommended by Agent.
No contact with the victim.
Provide DNA sample if not already provided.
Anger Mangement counseling.

timeConds.notes: Condition Time - STAYED. With Huber. To be used at Agent's discretion as well as to huber or straight time.

with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Martin A Radish in court with attorney Matthew Huppertz.  Brian J. Juech appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant enters a no contest plea to the amended charage in the information. Court imposed the following sentence:

  The Defendant was given the following:

WITHHELD SENTENCE;

TERM OF PROBATION: 1 YEAR

CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:  

*Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent;
*Maintain employment and/or combination of schooling 
*No contact with:  the victim
*DNA sample to be provided if not yet previously done.
*Anger Management Couneling
*50 hours of community service
 
COURT COSTS:  $243.00 (to be paid as a condition of probation);

DNA SURCHARGE:  $200.00 (to be paid as a condition of probation);

CONDITION TIME: 30 days with huber, STAYED; to be used at agent's discretion.  Agent to determine with or without non working hours.  
 
Expunction is conditionally granted upon verification of completion of sentence, payment of all costs/fees and no new criminal law violations.
